trends: There have been no other sightings in Blanca
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas heading to get some fast food on hwy 24 as i seen this yellow-orange light glowing very bright. Nothing blinking at all looked to me that it was in are atmosphere so i kept staring at it while my mother drove couldnt not tell if it was moving or not. Then in just a few it started to dim very slowly were i wanted to focus more to see then it dimmed so quickly i could see the outline like a lightbulb being shut off very fast. Ive lived near a airport almost my whole life never seen a light vanish like that.
Summary: Seen Yellow-Orange Light dim alittle then vanished.
